info.title: Woop to Carrier
info.description:
This document contains the technical information about Woop APIs for carriers. For any questions or clarification, please contact the internal technical team.

To use "Carrier to Woop" APIs, you must use the confidential access codes provided when you created your carrier account on the platform.

The version currently available in the documentation is **Version 1.6.0**

post.description: This method is used to receive requests for quotes. If the quote is validated, the information transmitted will be used to create the delivery order using POST/deliveries.

requestBody.description: Contains the information needed to create a delivery quote.

201.description: Success code, the quotes have been generated for the order. All carriers contacted have a quote ID to accept a delivery.

202.description:
The carrier is unable to process the request for technical or functional reasons, and indicates this with a standard refusal reason and a precise comment.

[See the refusal reasons](https://woop.stoplight.io/docs/carrier/docs/Models/Refused%20reasons.md)

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body.

delete.description: Use this method to receive requests to cancel a quote.

403.description: The quote cannot/can no longer be cancelled

404.description: The quote identifier 'quoteId' does not exist

post.description: This method allows you to validate a quote and receive the delivery order. In response, it provides additional information about the delivery.

requestBody.description: Contains the information required to create a delivery request.

201.description: The delivery is accepted, a 'deliveryId' is returned, additionally a table of 'parcels' ids can be returned if tracking by parcel. A table of labels can also be returned.

205.description:
The delivery is refused in the end, the possible reasons for refusal are entered in "reasons".

[See the refusal reasons](https://woop.stoplight.io/docs/carrier/docs/Models/Refused%20reasons.md)

value.comment: I will not accept this delivery after all.

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

delete.description: This method allows you to send a request to cancel a delivery and confirm it with the carrier. The carrier does not need to request a cancellation on receipt of this request.

requestBody.description: Contains information on the reasons for the delivery cancellation.

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

schema.description: Information about the refusal to cancel

patch.description: This method is used to receive requests to update a delivery.

infos.description: Additional information about the delivery address

401.description: You are not allowed to access this item.

put.description: This method allows you to receive notification of a new delivery rating.

comment.question: Do you have any suggestions to share with us to help us improve our delivery service?

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

openingHours.description: Opening hours of the relay point

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body.

get.description: This method allows you to retrieve the list of relay points located around a specific geolocation.
Retrieving a label in the requested format

200.description: OK, contains the label in base64

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

put.description: to send the pinCode to the carrier

address.description: All relevant information for a delivery/collection address.
address.title: Address (address)

addressLine1.description: Full address of the main location

elevator.description:
Indicates whether the address has a lift
Default value: FALSE

floor.description:
Specifies the floor of the address in question
Default value: 0

postalCode.description: The postcode of the main address

subType.description:
type = exchange place ,
subtype = 
- EXCHANGE_PLACE_STORE
- EXCHANGE_PLACE_PFU
- EXCHANGE_PLACE_STORAGE

type = pickup point ,
subtype = 
- PICKUP_POINT_AGENCY
- PICKUP_POINT_POST_OFFICE
- PICKUP_POINT_RELAY_WITH_LOCKER
- PICKUP_POINT_RELAY_WITHOUT_LOCKER
- PICKUP_POINT_DRIVE

addressWithoutSensitiveData.title: Address without door code (addressWithoutSensitiveData)
addressWithoutSensitiveData.description: Information about an address without a door code.

addressLine1.description: Full address of the main location

elevator.description:
Indicates whether the address has a lift
Default value: FALSE

floor.description:
Specifies the floor of the address in question
Default value: 0

postalCode.description: The postcode of the main address

interval.title: Date slot (interval)
interval.description: Specifies a date range with time

contact.description: Personal information on the delivery and/or collection contact.

firstName.description: The first name of the end customer

lastName.description: The last name of the end customer

phone.description: The telephone number of the end customer

email.description: The e-mail address of the end customer

contact.title: Contact (contact)

tags.description: Allows you to set "markers" on this order.
tags.title: Tags (tags)

contactWithLocalization.description: Personal information on the delivery and/or collection contact.
contactWithLocalization.title: Contact (contactWithLocalization)

firstName.description: The first name of the end customer

lastName.description: The last name of the end customer

phone.description: The telephone number of the end customer

email.description: The e-mail address of the end customer

language.description: The language of the end customer

timezone.description: The delivery time zone of the end customer

package.description: Retailer's handling unit. Generally used as a collection of products in the order grouped by package.
package.title: Package (package)

references.description: references if provided by the retailer

reference.description: Internal package references if provided by the retailer

products.description: List of products in the package

quantity.description: Quantity of product in the package

quoteId.description: Unique identifier referring to the quote sent by the carrier. Please note that this identifier must be unique to the order.

notation.title: Customer rating (notation)
notation.description: Specifies the rating received from the end customer for the delivery.

comment.question: Do you have any suggestions to share with us to help us improve our delivery service?

score.title: Score (score)
score.description: Specifies the score obtained for the delivery.

includedInCarrierScore.description: Included in the calculation of the carrier rating

length.description: Specifies the size of a package.
length.title: Dimension (length)

mass.description: Specifies the weight of a package/product.
mass.title: Weight (mass)

retailer.title: Retailer
retailer.description: Provides the information for the identification of the retailer during a delivery.

refusedReason.description: Describes the reasons possible for refusal in the related article: "Reasons for refusal'.
refusedReason.title: Reason for refusal (refusedReason)

cancelledReason.description: List of possible reasons for delivery cancellation
cancelledReason.title: Reason for delivery cancellation (cancelledReason)

deliveryService.title: Delivery service (deliveryService)
deliveryService.description: Specifies the delivery services available on the platform.

vehicleType.title: Vehicle type (vehicleType)
vehicleType.description: Specifies the type of vehicle used for the delivery.

withoutContact.title: Information on the picking or delivery address.
withoutContact.description: Information on the picking or delivery address.

withContactAndLocalization.title: Delivery address information
withContactAndLocalization.description: Information on the picking or delivery address

postDelivery.title: Delivery request (postDelivery)
postDelivery.description: Contains the information required to create a delivery request.

orderId.description: Order identifier to be entered by the retailer. 1 orderId = 1 order

referenceNumber.description: Order reference, store number. Can be the same as the orderId.

packages.description: Retailer's handling unit. Generally used as a collection of products in the order grouped by package

orderId.description: Order identifier to be entered by the retailer. 1 orderId = 1 order

referenceNumber.description: Order reference, store number. Can be the same as the orderId.

quoteId.description: Unique quote identifier of the initial order

deliveryCreated.description: Feedback on the creation of a delivery.
deliveryCreated.title: Feedback (deliveryCreated)

deliveryId.description: Unique identifier of the delivery sent by the carrier. Please note that this identifier must be unique to the order.

coordinates.description: Specifies the geographical coordinates to be used for creation.
coordinates.title: Geographical coordinates (coordinates)

productPrice.title: Product sales prices (price)
productPrice.description: Corresponds to the sale prices of the products. Entered if the delivery is performed with the service “SERVICE_INSTALL”.

value.description: Label in base64 or URL to the label

Exemple.question: Do you have any suggestions to share with us to help us improve our delivery service?
